Antï¿½nio Mota wrote:

> Also, if you have in the same application a DELETE that deletes a 
> resource and not the URI and other DELETE that deletes both, then DELETE 
> isn't uniform any more.
>   

I disagree with that, because I don't think it's actually violating the 
DELETE specification.

If you have self-descriptive messages and are leveraging HATEOAS there 
should be no issue mixing both approaches in one system.
